titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to give preference to local communities in the application consideration process for the conservation reserve program.
A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to give preference to local communities in the application consideration process for the conservation reserve program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to give conservation reserve program preference to an owner or operator who is a resident in the county in which the land is located, or in a contiguous county, if the land would provide at least equivalent conservation benefits to competing offers.
